es.eucm.eadandroid.common.loader.parsers
Class AdventureHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      es.eucm.eadandroid.common.loader.parsers.AdventureHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
public class AdventureHandler
extends DefaultHandler

This class is the handler to parse the e-Adventure descriptor file.

Author:
Bruno Torijano Bueno
